string.name: autostartWarning
string.xliff:g: [w] Autostart is disabled!\nAlarms may fail to work after reboot.

resources.string: Off.\nAlarms may fail to display correctly.
[w] Notifications are off. Alarms may fail to display correctly.
Alarms are automatically rescheduled a few minutes after reboot.\n\n%1$s
Show all system sounds during selection (ignore ringtone type).
Show alarm clock icon in the app tray.
Wake the device from the power off state.\npackage: %s
Settings found,\nbut they are for other widgets…
Restore Backup. Imported settings will be cached for now and restored later when requested by the launcher.
Best Guess. Imported settings will be applied to existing widgets by type.
Direct Import. Imported settings will be applied directly. This only works correctly if the widget ids are unchanged.
Clear. Alarms will be cleared before importing from backup.
Keep Existing. Existing alarms will be preserved (may result in duplicates).
Clear. Places will be cleared before importing from backup.
Keep Existing. Existing places will be preserved (may result in duplicates).
Ignore Existing. Places will be added if they do not already exist (ignore existing).
Overwrite Existing. Places will be updated if they already exist.

%s is available gratis, but if it has proven its value, please pay as you like.

Iturburu kodea:
Copyright © 2014-2024 Forrest Guice
Iturburu kodea GPLv3 lizentziapean eskuragarri dago.
Start the first launch configuration wizard.

Swap layouts to fill available space

[enabled] The widget will switch between layouts depending on available space.

[disabled] The widget maintains its initial layout when resized. Use this with the \"scale text and icons\" option for extra large widgets.
This widget was created with a %1$s initial layout.

Hurrengo izenburu ordezkoak onartzen dira:

Widget guztiak:
* %d datarako (adib. Otsailak 12)
* %dd egunerako (laburra) (adib. Al)
* %dD egunerako (luzea) (adib. Astelehena)
* %dY urterako (adib. 2018)
* %dt ordurako (azken eguneraketarena)
* %dT ordurako, segunduekin (azken eguneraketarena)

* %loc etiketarako (adib. Euskal Herriko erdigunea)
* %lat latituderako
* %lon longituderako
* %lel for elevation (e.g. 1258 meters)

* %s datuen jatorrirako (adib. sunrisesunsetlib)
* %t ordu eremurako (id) (adib. CET)
* %id appWidgetIDrako

Eguzkiaren widgetak:
* %m modurako (laburra) (adib. Zibila)
* %M modurako (luzea) (adib. Krepuskulu zibila)
* %o for order (e.g. Last/Next, Today)

Ilargiaren widgetak:
* %i ilargiaren argiztapenerako (adib. 25%)
* %M ilargialdirako (adib. Ilgora)
* %o for order (e.g. Last/Next, Today)

Solstizioaren widgetak:
* %m modurako (laburra) (adib. Solstizioa)
* %M modurako (luzea) (adib. Neguko solstizioa)
* %o for order (e.g. Closest Event, Upcoming Event)

Date Format: A date format pattern.

Available elements may differ between calendars, but usually include..

E : day of week
d : day of month
D : day of year
F : weekday in month
M : month of year
y : year of era
G : era

[Icon Rising] moonrise 		[Icon Noon] lunar noon 
[Icon Setting] moonset 		[Icon Midnight] lunar midnight 

Share [Icon Share] will copy text to the clipboard.

Spring Cross-Quarter: The midpoint between Winter Solstice and Spring Equinox; February [northern hemisphere], or August [southern hemisphere].

Summer Cross-Quarter: The midpoint between Spring Equinox and Summer Solstice; May [northern hemisphere], or November [southern hemisphere].

Autumn Cross-Quarter: The midpoint between Summer Solstice and Autumnal Equinox; August [northern hemisphere], or February [southern hemisphere].

Winter Cross-Quarter: The midpoint between Autumnal Equinox and Winter Solstice; November [northern hemisphere], or May [southern hemisphere].

[Icon OK] Choose a custom event.
 [Icon Add] Add, [Icon Edit] edit, or [Icon Delete] delete custom events.
 
Custom events can be displayed by the app, by home screen widgets, or used to schedule alarms and notifications.
 [Icon View] Marked events are displayed by the app.

[Icon Back] to cancel without making changes.
[Icon Save] to save, and [Icon Done] to save and enable.
[Icon Cancel] to save and disable.
[Icon Delete] to cancel and delete.

[Icon Offset] is shown when the scheduled time is offset before or after the event time.
Day Light Saving: [Icon DST] is shown when the current time applies DST, or has been adjusted by a similar rule.
Benetako ordua: Eguzkia zeruertzean dago; hau da gutxi gorabehera egunsentiaren eta ilunabarraren ordua.

Krepuskulu zibila: Eguzkia 6 gradu zeruertzaren azpitik dago; izar argitsuenak ikusi daitezke. Argi nahikoa dago kanpoko jardueretarako argi bat erabili behar gabe.

Itsas krepuskulua: Eguzkia 8 gradu zeruertzaren azpitik dago; objektuen ingerada eta zeruertza gero eta bereizezinagoak dira. Ez dago argi nahikorik kanpoko jarduera gehienetarako argi bat erabili behar gabe.

Krepuskulu astronomikoa: Eguzkia 18 gradu zeruertzaren azpitik dago. Gauaren iluntasunetik hurbil.

Today: Rising and setting event times for today\'s date.

Last / Next: The time of the last event, and the next upcoming event.

Udaberriko ekinokzioa: The start of astronomical spring; March [northern hemisphere], or September [southern hemisphere]. The March equinox is also called the northward equinox.

Udako solstizioa: The start of astronomical summer; June [northern hemisphere], or December [southern hemisphere]. The June solstice is also called the northern solstice.

Udazkeneko ekinokzioa: The start of astronomical autumn; September [northern hemisphere], or March [southern hemisphere]. The September equinox is also called the southward equinox.

Negu solstizioa: The start of astronomical winter; December [northern hemisphere], or June [southern hemisphere]. The December solstice is also called the southern solstice.

Tropical Year: A full cycle of the seasons. The length of the tropical year is measured from one March equinox to the next. It is ~365.24 days on average, with an exact length that varies each year (up to 30 minutes).

Egunaren iraupena: Egunsentiaren eta ilunabarraren arteko denbora.

Argi erabilgarria: Goizeko eta arratsaldeko krepuskulu zibilen arteko denbora.

Ilargiaren argiztapena: Ilargiaren widgetak eta orri nagusiak ilargiaren argiztapena gauerdian erakusten dute (ilargiaren irteera eta ilargia ezkutatzearen erdiko puntua), eta ilargiaren dialogoak ilargiaren oraingo argiztapena erakusten du aldiz.

Urrezko ordua: Eguzkia 6 gradu zeruertzaren gainetik edo azpitik tartean dago. Goizean urrezko ordua krepuskulu zibilarekin hasten da eta egunsentitik gutxira amaitzen da. Arratsaldean urrezko ordua ilunabarra baino zertxobait lehenago hasten da eta krepuskulu zibilarekin amaitzen da.
Ordu urdina: Eguzkia zeruertzaren azpitik 8 eta 4 gradu artean dago. Ordu urdinaren hasiera eta amaiera itsas krepuskuluaren eta krepuskulu zibilaren artean gertatzen dira.
Abiaraziko den Activityaren klase izen guztiz egokia.

Widget berri bat gehitzeko etxeko pantailara jo behar duzu.

Existitzen den widget bat birkonfiguratzeko hurrengo zerrendatik hautatu dezakezu.

[Icon Add] Gai berri bat gehitu edo [Icon Copy] existitzen den bat kopiatu.
 
 [Icon Edit] Gaiak editatu edo [Icon Delete] ezabatu.
 Gai [Icon Default] lehenetsiak ezin dira ezabatu.

Gertaeraz hornitu egutegiaren aplikazioa (ilargialdiak, solstizioak, eta ekinokzioak).

Egutegi baimenak kendu dira.

Ezaugarri hau beste aplikazio batean eskuragarri dago.

Pribatutasuna:
Suntimes aplikazioak ez du inolako informazio pertsonalik biltzen, gordetzen, edo bidaltzen. Ez du iragarkirik, ez analisi tresnarik, ez aztarnaririk, ezta beharrezkoa ez den baimenik.

Pribatutasuna:
Suntimes aplikazioak ez du inolako informazio pertsonalik biltzen, gordetzen, edo bidaltzen. Ez du iragarkirik, ez analisi tresnarik, ez aztarnaririk, ezta beharrezkoa ez den baimenik.

Aplikazioa kokapen datuekin konfiguratuta dago. Informazio hau (eta aplikazioak erabiltzen duen beste konfigurazio datuak) gailuan bertan gordetzen da eta ez du gailua uzten.

%1$s

Suntimes aplikazioak kokapen baimena behar du zure uneko longitudea eta latitudea zehazteko.

Baimen hau hautazkoa da; kokapena eskuz ezartzen da modu lehenetsian.
Suntimes aplikazioak kanpoko biltegirako baimenak behar ditu datuen babes kopiak egiteko eta esportatzeko (adib. tokiak, gaiak).

Suntimes Alarms uses the external storage permission to play sounds located on the SD card.

This permission is optional; the default sound will be played if access is denied. This permission is not needed for system sounds (Media Storage).

A permission that belongs to Suntimes:

%1$s

is also defined by: %2$s
This feature is not supported by API %1$s.
This feature is not supported by the current data source.
A reboot may be needed for changes to take effect.
A restart may be needed for changes to take full effect.
Do not show this message again
Kalkulagailu arrunt, azkar samarra, baina ez zehatza.
National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administrationek argitaratutako algoritmoak jarraitzen ditu.
Dershowitz/Reingoldek haien "Calendrical Calculations" (hirugarren edizioa) liburuan argitaratutako algoritmoak jarraitzen ditu.
Jean Meeusek bere "Astronomical Algorithms" (bigarren edizioa) liburuan argitaratutako kalkulu astronomikoetan oinarrituta.

Suntimes uses third-party libraries to perform astronomical calculations.

The data source setting allows choosing between different libraries (or choosing between different algorithms offered by those libraries). The default is time4a-time4j.

This setting affects the speed and accuracy of calculations, and may limit which features are available.

For more information about available choices, or extending the app to support other libraries, see the online help.
